utilities

Class MergeSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.MergeSort

  • public class MergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
    implementation of merge sort. Called by the sorting manager and sorts the array. The method determines what the comparison type is and sorts it accordingly
    Author:
    Hussein
